backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing the purpose of all frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_PUBLISHING.md: Step-by-step guide for packaging and publishing the PWA to Google Play using a TWA wrapper.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint including PWA metadata, icons, manifest link, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, start URL, colors, orientation, and app icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the TruckGame inside a full-size container.
frontend/src/game/components/GameOverScr: Game over overlay displaying the final score and a restart button.
frontend/src/game/components/Hud.tsx: Top HUD showing current score and a pause button during gameplay.
frontend/src/game/components/PauseOverla: Pause screen overlay providing a resume button and preventing interaction with the game.
frontend/src/game/components/StartScreen: Start screen UI with game title, instructions, start button, and expandable Google Play publishing info.
frontend/src/game/components/TouchContro: Renders left and right on-screen buttons for lane movement with click and touch handlers.
frontend/src/game/TruckGame.tsx: Main game UI component coordinating gameplay state, rendering road, truck, obstacles, and managing overlays.
frontend/src/game/useTruckGame.ts: Main game state hook handling movement, obstacle spawning, scoring, collisions, and the game loop.
frontend/src/game/utils/collision.ts: Collision detection utility comparing truck lane and vertical position with obstacles.
frontend/src/game/utils/spawn.ts: Obstacle spawning utilities deciding when to spawn and selecting a lane for new obstacles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity initialization via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since the game uses only client-side state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark road-themed colors and game-specific styles like road stripes and overlays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin extensions for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an Android-targeted truck web game, including architecture notes, known issues, required images, and a list of implemented features.
